card1.desc: Training, Analysis, and Development. We teach your team to use AI every day. We analyze your processes to understand where to implement AI, eliminate bottlenecks, and develop tailored solutions.

card2.desc: The AI agent for WhatsApp reporting. Prisma contacts the team and transforms voice notes, photos, and messages into structured data and weekly reports. Save 20 minutes per day per employee.

bluvacanze.challengeDesc: An archive of thousands of inactive contacts. A true commercial treasure, but impossible to manage manually.
bluvacanze.solutionDesc: An AI agent that initiates proactive conversations on WhatsApp, profiles the user, and proposes personalized trips.

dolomiti.challengeDesc: Reporting from construction sites was slow and chaotic. Lost voice notes, paper sheets, and administrative delays.
dolomiti.solutionDesc: This is where Prisma was born. The agent that transcribes voice messages and photos from the site directly into the management system.

restworld.challengeDesc: A constant flow of unqualified leads that slowed down the sales team, with response times that were too long.
restworld.solutionDesc: An intelligent filter active 24/7. The AI Agent analyzes responses and passes only concrete opportunities to the salespeople.

FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI services.

items.question: What is Martes AI and how does it work?
items.answer: Martes AI is a multidisciplinary team that helps companies scale using AI and automation. We create custom AI agents and intelligent workflows to speed up your business operations.

items.question: What services do you provide as an AI Transformation Partner?
items.answer: We provide process automation, WhatsApp AI agents, and operational reporting automation. Our goal is to reduce manual tasks and increase efficiency for your business.

items.question: How will a WhatsApp AI Agent benefit my business?
items.answer: Based on our success stories, our AI agents have generated significant revenue (e.g., €82,271 in a month for Bluvacanze). It provides 24/7 customer support and helps qualify leads automatically.

items.question: How long does it take to get a custom solution?
items.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of the project. However, we can often implement initial automations within a few weeks to start relieving pressure from your team.

items.question: How can I start discussing my project with you?
items.answer: It's simple! Click the 'Book a Call' button on our site to schedule a meeting or fill out our contact form. Our team will analyze your project and get back to you quickly.
